summary: A small fix for people who use USKRP and MO and suffer from periodic startup crashes.
descriptionHtml:
USKRP Crash on Startup Fix

DESCRIPTION:
A very small fix for those who use USKRP 2.5.2.* and experience impermanent crashes on startup.
I did some investigations and it looks like this bug is caused by wrong "Perk condition tab count" value in "Blade Barrier" perk's modified effects.

Corrections that I made, most likely solved "crash on startup" problem (several dozens of Skyrim launches in testing purposes with zero crashes), so this fix COULD help you.

REQUIREMENTS:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url] 1.3.01 by T3nd0
- Unofficial Skyrim Redone Patch 2.5.2.2 (from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629]SkyRe Compatibility and ReProccer Patches[/url] by Xathra).

INSTALLATION:
- Download "USKRP CoS Fix PATCH VERSION"
- Unpack the archive.
- Drop SkyRe_USKRP_BB_fix.esp in the same folder where SkyRe_Main.esp is.
- Activate it via Skyrim Launcher or any other mod manager.
OR
- Download "USKRP CoS Fix MERGED VERSION"
- Unpack the archive.
- Replace your SkyRe_Main.esp with modified one from archive.

CREDITS
All credits goes to T3nd0, Xathra and all who worked on USKRP.
author: Ingvion
